org.jclouds.abiquo.internal
Class BaseMonitoringService

java.lang.Object
  org.jclouds.abiquo.internal.BaseMonitoringService
All Implemented Interfaces:
MonitoringService
Direct Known Subclasses:
BaseAsyncTaskMonitor, BaseConversionMonitor, BaseVirtualApplianceMonitor, BaseVirtualMachineMonitor
@Singleton
public class BaseMonitoringService
extends Object
implements MonitoringService

Utility service to monitor asynchronous operations.

Author:
Ignasi Barrera, Francesc Montserrat

Field Detail

context

protected org.jclouds.rest.RestContext<AbiquoApi,AbiquoAsyncApi> context

scheduler

protected ScheduledExecutorService scheduler
The scheduler used to perform monitoring tasks.

pollingDelay

protected Long pollingDelay

eventBus

protected com.google.common.eventbus.EventBus eventBus
The event bus used to dispatch monitoring events.

A sync bus is used by default, to prevent deadlocks when using the BlockingEventHandler.
